name: 9.19 "Sam Time, Next Year" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 9 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What famous politician was seen in the cold opening (teaser)?
questions.explanation:
Michael Dukakis.

	Michael Dukakis was governor of Massachusetts from 1975-1979, and then again from 1983-1991. In the 1988 presidential campaign he ran against George H.W. Bush. Sam and Norm were trying to decide what to call him and they settled on "Duke" but by that time he had passed and they just got in a quick "hi".

questions.text: Which celebratory day occurred in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Valentine's Day.

	Carla rushed to get something to Sam. When Rebecca asked what it was Carla replied, "His Vitamin E, it's Valentine's Day..duh".

questions.text: How long had Sam been going on one date a year with Lauren?
questions.explanation:
20 years.

	Norm said it was Sam's version of commitment. Rebecca thought the whole thing was stupid.

questions.text: Who did Rebecca say she had a date with?
questions.explanation:
Ben and Jerry.

	Ben and Jerry's is an ice cream company out of Vermont, USA. When Jerry Garcia died they renamed his favorite ice cream Cherry Garcia. Rebecca didn't have a date for Valentine's Day so she planned to stay home and eat ice cream.

questions.text: What did Lilith call the men in Frasier's therapy group when she walked into the bar?
questions.explanation:
dysfunctional.

	Frasier had a group of men who couldn't relate to women. Lilith had the women who couldn't relate to men. They decided to get them together to try to get them to mingle with each other.

questions.text: Who slipped and fell on the ice?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Woody never salted the steps like he was supposed to. Sam hurt his back but kept his date with Lauren. He had Woody drive him to Vermont.

Barbara Feldon.

	Barbara Feldon may be best known for her role in the 1960s as 99 in "Get Smart". She reprised that role in the TV reunion "Get Smart Again" in 1989.

questions.text: What game were the men and women playing when the man said, "I pass"?
questions.explanation:
Spin the Bottle.

	The plan to bring the men and women together failed. Lilith had accepted this, but Frasier refused to give up.

questions.text: Why did Lauren think Sam didn't want to dance?
questions.explanation:
She'd gotten too old.

	Sam finally leveled with Lauren about his back. She said, "I'm not surprised at your age."

Cliff.

	Rebecca kissed Cliff to say thank you. Cliff stood frozen and all he could repeat was "Thank you...Thank you."
